name: Unwrap The Candy
description:
You are buying the source code of Unwrap The Candy. whit over 100 levels created so far.

To modify the game you will need a license the for construct 2 but if you do not have a construct 2 licence or don't want to buy one you can modify the assets in the HTML folder.

The zip file contains the source code, a html folder with the game and .capx file that contains the source code and the documentation you need to create more levels.
